attributes.label: Le Privé Founders Edition
attributes.description: The Founders Edition has everything you love about the Le Privé, and more. Available spring 2025.

attributes.name: Fern
attributes.description: Exclusive to the Founders Edition, Fern is a blend of earthy green tones, inspired by nature’s beauty.

attributes.name: Poppy
attributes.description: Inspired by California Poppy, Poppy is full of energy and warmth, made to turn heads and spark joy on the road.

attributes.name: Sand
attributes.description: Elegant and understated, Sand brings a grounded, natural sophistication inspired by serene coastal landscapes.

attributes.name: Sky
attributes.description: A fresh, airy hue that captures the open sky. Perfect for those who see every drive as a new adventure.

items.title: Easy Tow
items.description: The world's first dual-motor Active Tow Assist System, designed for safer, effortless towing with extended range and improved efficiency.

items.title: Magic Hitch
items.description: One-touch sensing, self-positioning, and attaching to your tow vehicle.

items.title: Remote Control
items.description: Move around a campsite or driveway vit the Pebble App, pivoting effortlessly, and positioning into tight spots with ease.

items.title: InstaCamp
items.description: Be camp-ready in seconds, stress-free. With just one touch, watch the corner stabilizers, all-terrain levelers (optional), and stairs automatically set-up camp for you.

items.title: Priority Delivery
items.description: We’re prioritizing Founders Edition builds, giving you the opportunity to be among the first to receive your Le Privé by choosing this exclusive edition.

items.title: Exclusive Paint & Badges
items.description: Exclusive to the Founders Edition, the limited-edition Fern color is a blend of earthy green tones, inspired by nature’s beauty.

items.title: Lifetime Roadside Assistance
items.description: From towing support to emergency services, we’re here to keep your travels seamless and worry-free—because every great adventure deserves reliable backup. *non-transferable

items.title: Founders Club
items.description: An exclusive club for Le Privé Founders Edition owners. Enjoy unparalleled perks, including priority software updates, priority access to events, insider updates, and lifetime roadside assistance. As a Founders Club member, you’re not just part of the journey—you’re helping shape the future of adventure.

items.title: Exclusive Accessories
items.description: The Founders Edition Le Privé comes with exclusive accessories, including a tow hitch with integrated tongue weight measurement for safer towing, luxurious premium bedding and mattress for unmatched comfort, and a portable projector speaker to elevate your entertainment experience.

items.title: Tax Credit
items.description: Each Le Privé comes equipped with a generous battery, and an optional integrated rooftop solar system is also available. These features may qualify you for a tax credit of up to $10,000, subject to eligibility. *You should consult your professional tax advisor(s) to confirm whether you qualify for a tax credit, given your personal circumstances. Pebble does not provide tax or legal advice.

attributes.name: Powered Corner Stabilizers
attributes.description: Designed to stabilizer your Le Privé on standard campsite terrain.

attributes.label: Standard Features
attributes.description: Features that come standard

children.text: Le Privé comes equipped with four powered corner stabilizers, standard across all trim levels. Easily deploy and control them via the Pebble App for a seamless and hassle-free setup experience.

attributes.name: Silent HVAC
attributes.description: Your automotive-grade, high-efficiency, and whisper-quiet AC and heating system.

attributes.label: Standard Features
attributes.description: Features that come standard

children.text: Whether you want to heat things up or cool things off, simply pre-set the whisper-quiet HVAC with the Pebble App so it’s comfortable as soon as you set up camp.
The fully insulated shell keeps the temperatures just right and the external ultra-high efficiency heat pump keeps things quiet.
The high-efficiency heat pump provides 15,000 BTU for both cooling and heating.

attributes.name: Interior Privacy Glass
attributes.description: The bathroom’s glass walls turn from clear to opaque with just a touch.

attributes.label: Standard Features
attributes.description: Features that come standard

children.text: When not in use, the clear bathroom glass enhances Le Privé’s interior openness. For privacy, simply activate the physical switch to instantly turn the glass opaque. This feature is controlled exclusively by the physical switch inside the bathroom, ensuring your privacy is always protected.

attributes.name: Dual-Motor Active Tow Assist System
attributes.description: A set of powerful electric motors allowing unprecedented maneuvering capabilities and enhanced towing efficiency.

attributes.label: Upgrades
attributes.description: Upgrades to customize to your preferences

children.text: Easy Tow is the world's first dual-motor Active Tow Assist System, designed for safer, effortless towing with extended range and improved efficiency. Compared to towing a traditional travel trailer of similar size and weight, gas-powered vehicles will experience a significant boost in MPG, while electric vehicles will travel much farther on a single charge.
Remote Control allows you to move around a campsite or driveway via the Pebble App, pivoting effortlessly, and positioning into tight spots with ease.
Magic Hitch allows one-touch sensing, self-positioning, and attaching to your tow vehicle.

attributes.name: Integrated Rooftop Solar
attributes.description: 1.1 kW solar power allows for self-charging on the go or when parked.

attributes.label: Upgrades
attributes.description: Upgrades to customize to your preferences

children.text: Four 290W roof-mounted solar panels, providing a constant power supply equivalent to being plugged into a 110V outlet. This system keeps your battery topped off, extending your off-grid adventures with ease and reliability

attributes.name: All-Terrain Levelers
attributes.description: A pair of robust hydraulic levelers that offer an enhanced leveling experience, even on rough and uneven terrain.

attributes.label: Upgrades
attributes.description: Upgrades to customize to your preferences

children.text: Working seamlessly with the four standard powered corner stabilizers and the front wheel jack, the powerful
All-terrain Levelers
deliver enhanced pitch and roll leveling capabilities for optimal stability and comfort on rough, uneven terrain. Fully app-enabled, you can easily level your Le Privé with just a tap.

attributes.name: Powered Awning
attributes.description: An integrated, motorized awning with a built-in LED light strip. App-controlled for easier deployment with manual set-and-finish.

attributes.label: Upgrades
attributes.description: Upgrades to customize to your preferences

children.text: Deploy or retract in seconds using the Pebble App. The two support legs neatly store behind the awning cover, maintaining a sleek and minimalistic appearance. Additionally, the integrated LED light strip is fully app-controlled, allowing you to adjust exterior lighting effortlessly.

attributes.name: Blackout Window Curtain
attributes.description: Integrated blackout window curtains.

attributes.label: Upgrades
attributes.description: Upgrades to customize to your preferences

children.text: Designed for enhanced light blocking, ensuring a restful night's sleep.

attributes.name: Exterior Smart Glass
attributes.description: Simply touch a button and all exterior windows turn opaque, providing instant privacy with ease.

attributes.label: Upgrades
attributes.description: Upgrades to customize to your preferences

children.text: Switch between clear for maximum openness and opaque for privacy at the campsite across all exterior windows, using either a physical switch or the Pebble App. Even better, you can control each zone for personalized comfort and convenience.

attributes.name: Mobile Charger
attributes.description: Easily charge your Le Privé at home or while at the campsite.

attributes.label: Accessories
attributes.description: Accessories to for one stop shopping

attributes.label: Le Privé Magic Pack
attributes.description: Add a powerful electric dual-motor system and unlock a set of world's first features. Available fall 2025.

attributes.name: Poppy
attributes.description: Inspired by California Poppy, Poppy is full of energy and warmth, made to turn heads and spark joy on the road.

attributes.name: Sand
attributes.description: Elegant and understated, Sand brings a grounded, natural sophistication inspired by serene coastal landscapes.

attributes.name: Sky
attributes.description: A fresh, airy hue that captures the open sky. Perfect for those who see every drive as a new adventure.

items.title: All-electric Power
items.description: The standard 45 kWh LFP (Lithium Iron Phosphate) battery supports extended off-grid adventures for up to 7 days. The system also serves as a backup power source for your home, can power most appliances, and even charge your EV, providing added peace of mind.

items.title: Automotive Construction
items.description: Built using rigorous automotive manufacturing processes. All-aluminum space frame construction. Lightweight composite and sustainable materials. Built-to-last durability that surpasses industry standards. A commitment to making Le Privé the safest RV trailer on the road.

items.title: Easy Tow
items.description: The world's first dual-motor Active Tow Assist System, designed for safer, effortless towing with extended range and improved efficiency.

items.title: Magic Hitch
items.description: One-touch sensing, self-positioning, and attaching to your tow vehicle.

items.title: Remote Control
items.description: Move around a campsite or driveway via the Pebble App, pivoting effortlessly, and positioning into tight spots with ease.

items.title: InstaCamp
items.description: Be camp-ready in seconds, stress-free. With just one touch, watch the corner stabilizers, all-terrain levelers (optional), and stairs automatically set-up camp for you.

items.title: Pebble App
items.description: The power of the Pebble is at your fingertips. Control, monitor, configure, and precondition your Le Privé from the included iPad mini.

items.title: Tax Credit
items.description: Each Le Privé comes equipped with a generous battery, and an optional integrated rooftop solar system is also available. These features may qualify you for a tax credit of up to $10,000, subject to eligibility. *You should consult your professional tax advisor(s) to confirm whether you qualify for a tax credit, given your personal circumstances. Pebble does not provide tax or legal advice.

attributes.label: Le Privé Standard
attributes.description: Essential Pebble design, 45 kWh battery, and comfort for a seamless, elevated RV experience on every journey. Planned for 2026.

attributes.name: Poppy
attributes.description: Inspired by California Poppy, Poppy is full of energy and warmth, made to turn heads and spark joy on the road.

attributes.name: Sand
attributes.description: Elegant and understated, Sand brings a grounded, natural sophistication inspired by serene coastal landscapes.

attributes.name: Sky
attributes.description: A fresh, airy hue that captures the open sky. Perfect for those who see every drive as a new adventure.

items.title: All-electric Power
items.description: The standard 45 kWh LFP (Lithium Iron Phosphate) battery supports AC and Level 3 DC fast charging and is designed for extended off-grid adventures for up to 7 days. With a maximum power output of 12 kW, the system also doubles as a backup power source for your home, can power most appliances, and even charge your EV, providing added peace of mind.

items.title: Automotive Construction
items.description: Built using rigorous automotive manufacturing processes. All-aluminum space frame construction. Lightweight composite and sustainable materials. Built-to-last durability that surpasses industry standards. A commitment to making Le Privé the safest RV trailer on the road.

items.title: InstaCamp
items.description: Be camp-ready in seconds, stress-free. With just one touch, watch the corner stabilizers, all-terrain levelers (optional), and stairs automatically set-up camp for you.

items.title: Pebble App
items.description: The power of the Pebble is at your fingertips. Control, monitor, configure, and precondition your Le Privé from the included iPad mini.

items.title: Tax Credit
items.description: Each Le Privé comes equipped with a generous battery, and an optional integrated rooftop solar system is also available. These features may qualify you for a tax credit of up to $10,000, subject to eligibility. *You should consult your professional tax advisor(s) to confirm whether you qualify for a tax credit, given your personal circumstances. Pebble does not provide tax or legal advice.

page.pickupPointAddress: 2800 Bayview Drive, Fremont, CA 94538, United States

children.text: *Pre-production model shown throughout. Actual production model will vary. Actual trailer capabilities will vary based on the selected options and trim. Factors such as tow vehicles, tire specifications, drive modes, speed, weather conditions, HVAC settings, and accessories can all influence Easy Tow's assisted range/efficiency.
*Prices shown do not include tax, licensing, title, or destination fees.

*Eligible customers who purchase a qualified new Le Privé may be able to claim a tax credit of up to $10,000. Eligibility for this tax credit is subject to specific criteria, requirements and your configurations. We recommend consulting with a professional tax advisor to determine whether you qualify based on your personal circumstances. Please note, Pebble does not provide tax or legal advice. For more information, visit
Tax Credit Information
By placing a fully refundable preorder, you agree to the
Preorder Agreement
and have read the
Pebble Terms & Service
Privacy Policy
, and
Tax Credit Information

We're prioritizing Founders Edition builds, and reservation holders will receive an email with the next steps as soon as their trailer is ready for production. Additionally, you may be eligible for a tax credit of up to $10,000. For more details, please refer to our "Pebble's Priorities" guidelines.

seo.metaTitle: Pebble | Build Your Le Privé | All-electric RV Trailer

children.text: Pebble's vision is to create a world where home can be anywhere you want to take it. As we begin production of Le Privé, our next-generation all-electric RV trailer, our focus will be on the exclusive
Founders Edition

. The Founders Edition comes fully equipped with all available options and upgrades. Owners will also gain access to the Founders Club, unlocking access to a range of exclusive perks and benefits designed to enhance their journey.
Founders Edition
Priority delivery
Exclusive paint color (Fern)
Founders Edition badges
Tow hitch with integrated tongue weight measurement for safe towing
Lifetime Pebble roadside assistance (non-transferable)
Priority access to all future Pebble software features
Premium bedding & mattress
Portable projector with built-in Bluetooth speaker
Founders Club
Access to #FoundersClub on Pebble Community
Priority access to Pebble events

When your home can be anywhere, you can rely on Pebble Service to bring you peace of mind by providing reliable support wherever you are and whenever you need it. At launch, we will offer service out of our Fremont, CA Headquarters, along with roadside and mobile technician support through a network of trusted partners. Stay connected for updates on network expansion through the customer portal and email newsletter.
While we strive to expand our delivery network in the future, at launch the Le Privé will only be available for pickup at our Fremont, CA Headquarters.

The $500 preorder deposit is fully refundable upon request and will be applied toward your final purchase. Please note that any future changes may impact trailer pricing, delivery timelines, and availability.
Available spring 2025
Planned for fall 2025
Planned for 2026

pickupPointSection.title: Pickup location
pickupPointSection.description: Pickup is available from Pebble HQ in Fremont, California.
